experience_guidance.rule: Prohibit isolated advances by offensive assets (AIRCRAFT/FIGHTER/DECOY) into enemy radar/missile range without nearby allies (<=3 units) or SAM coverage overlap.
experience_guidance.rationale: Systemic offensive collapse from dispersed, unsupported engagements allowing piecemeal destruction; segments repeatedly show mutual support violations leading to isolated losses.

experience_guidance.rule: Prohibit deploying DECOY ahead of armed escorts without sustained overwatch fire from >=1 FIGHTER/AIRCRAFT within 4 units.
experience_guidance.rationale: Decoys sacrificed without backup, exacerbating coordination breakdowns and asset misallocation; episode highlights never deploying scouts unsupported.

experience_guidance.rule: Prohibit static positioning of AWACS/SAM without proactive radar layering and forward repositioning to maintain information dominance.
experience_guidance.rationale: Persistent inactivity and lack of overlap lost vision to enemy central grouping; core to episode-level structural failure in radar chaining.

experience_guidance.rule: Prohibit diverging formations or north-south splits among offensive assets without designated rally points for convergence prior to engagement.
experience_guidance.rationale: No formation flying led to fragmented vision and isolated 1v1 losses; episode identifies asset dispersion as primary coordination breakdown.
